channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: “Leaders in Action” Conversation with Dr. Rick Carter Scheduled for July 12
item.description: Date: Friday, July 12, 2024 10:30 AM - 12:30 PM - During this session, host Professor Azita Hirsa will discuss the “evolution and rebirth of the semiconductor industry and leadership in a dynamic geopolitical environment” with Dr. Rick Carter, Senior Director at GlobalFoundries. Participants will also be able to ask questions about any relevant aspects of the topic. Refreshments will be provided.
item.author: Community

item.title: NORDTECH Workforce Development Summit to be Held July 18
item.description: Date: Thursday, July 18, 2024 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM - The Northeast Regional Defense Technology Hub (NORDTECH) is organizing a day-long Workforce Development for Chips and Semiconductors Summit that will be held on Rensselaer’s Troy campus. The day will feature a keynote speech, a panel discussion, presentations from leading institutions and NORDTECH partners, breakout sessions, and a poster session. Register today to save your place!
item.author: Community

item.title: Registration Now Open for Summer 2024 Undergraduate Research Fair
item.description: Date: Monday, June 24, 2024 - Wed , July 17, 2024 (all day) - Undergraduate students of all majors who are participating in summer research are encouraged to register by July 17 for the Summer 2024 Undergraduate Research Fair, which will be hosted by the School of Science and take place from 3:00PM to 5:00PM on Wednesday, July 31 in the CBIS Atrium. It’s a great opportunity to present your work to the faculty and your peers!
item.author: Students

item.title: Frear Park Event to Feature Flower Planting, Trails Walk
item.description: Date: Wednesday, July 10, 2024 9:00 AM - 1:00 PM - Help plant native wildflower plants in Frear Park, and then enjoy a 1.5 mile nature trail walk! This event is open to all and will include lunch; please contact Professor Bram if interested.
item.author: Students

item.title: Rensselaer at Work to Host Systems Engineering and Technology Management Review
item.description:
Date: Wednesday, July 10, 2024 12:00 PM - 12:30 PM - Hosted by Dean Aric Krause, Ph.D., this information session focuses on Rensselaer’s flexible, project-based, online Systems Engineering and Technology Management graduate degree that will help prepare decision-makers with broader and deeper capabilities in leading dynamic organizations. Please register if you plan to attend.
